NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Your NCS Graduation Ceremony on 4 October
Dear {!Contact.Name} and Parent or Guardian,
You are warmly invited to your NCS Graduation Ceremony on 04/10/2015.
Come and celebrate your achievements on NCS with teammates and get a certificate, signed by the Prime Minister*!
Where? Mason Lecture Theatre Queen Mary University of London Mile End Road London E1 4NS
What time? Please sign in at 2:00 PM. The Ceremony will finish no more than 2 hours later.
What else do I need to know? - Young people can bring along 1 guest (due to venue capacity). - Please dress smartly. - We have also sent you a reminder in the post. This contains details about opportunities available to NCS graduates, so look out for it!
Going by public transport? Mile End station (Central, Hammersmith&City and District line) is a 5 minute walk from the campus. Stepney Green is also a 5 minute walk from the campus. Bus numbers 205, 25 and 339 stop right outside (Queen Mary University of London).
Driving? This is no general parking available on the campus and the surrounding area is a controlled parking zone. We strongly recommend you arrive by public transport.
Questions? Call 0203 542 2400 or email contact@ncsthechallenge.org
Yours sincerely, Jo Lunt Customer Services Manager The Challenge
*Only those eligible to graduate will get a certificate. We’ll contact you if you are noteligible to graduate or need to make up hours before you can graduate. If you are eligible for a certificate but can’t make graduation, we’ll post it to you afterwards.
.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
